animeTitle: Juusenki L-Gaim II: Farewell My Lovely + Pentagona Dolls
otherNames: 重戦機エルガイムII フェアウェル マイ ラブリー+ペンタゴナ ドールズ, Heavy Metal L-Gaim II: Farewell My Lovely + Pentagona Dolls, Heavy Metal L-Gaim OVA
synopsis: A recap OVA that portrays the second half of the series Heavy Metal L-Gaim. After the credits, there is a short clip animated for the OVA entitled "Pentagona Dolls", which is intended to be comic relief.
